business_inquiries: For business inquiries, please contact us at either of these two email addresses:
mentai_first_message: Hello! How are you? Do you have something to share or talk about?

faq.question1: Do you collect my data? I am concerned about privacy.
faq.answer1: NO, under no circumstances. Our technology itself cannot store any data programmatically.
faq.question2: Do you guarantee that your AI therapist will help me?
faq.answer2: Unfortunately, we cannot guarantee this. However, it will definitely ask the right questions and ensure that you feel heard and understood.
faq.question3: Does your AI therapist recommend medications?
faq.answer3: Yes, our AI therapist may recommend mild medications, as stronger ones would require the consultation of a licensed healthcare professional.
faq.question4: Is it cheaper for me to use your AI therapist or to see a real therapist?
faq.answer4: Choosing our AI therapist is absolutely cheaper, considering: 1. 24/7 access | 2. No need to worry about the confidentiality of your data. You have a safe space with us | 3. Empathy and comfort provided by the people who programmed the AI.

welcome_message_2: we do NOT store your data
welcome_message_3: we make you feel comfortable and safe
